author: .fjl
content: Quick announcement: I have just updated the hive rpc-compat tests with an improved chain, additional tests, and improved matching that allows for differing error messages across clients

author: .fjl
content: Another improvement to disable 'exact matching' on the result is in the pipeline.

author: .fjl
content: Most failing rpc-compat tests on hive2 are now actual spec deviations, or at least things worth discussing.

author: .fjl
content: I'll try my best to open issues in client repos, but you are also encouraged to check results yourself on hive2
